title: Tramontane Cafe
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffeehouse cafe, listening room, and music venue with a small gallery space. Offers coffee and espresso drinks with possibility for soy milk (might cost extra). Food menu includes sandwiches, soups, salads, and baked goods made in-house. Host open mic, poetry reading, acoustic music, and events -- see its webpage for calendar. On the second floor is its sister business, Shine Yoga and Wellness.
